TopicTitle: How to increase the range to collect science via module manager?

Articles.Content:
How do I make a module manager config to increase the range I can collect science from the goo canister and the material science bay? I'm tired of having to shove my kerbal's big green head all the way into the science jr. to collect data.

Edited February 13, 2015 by silentdeth

I'd kill for a way to transfer data within a ship without having to do it via EVA.

Maybe something else for the Scientist vocation to do?

I'd kill for a way to transfer data within a ship without having to do it via EVA.

Maybe something else for the Scientist vocation to do?

The Ship Manifest mod enables you to do this. No killing required.

Give this a try. I just wrote it based on the wiki and didn't test it, so it may have typos. This will double the range for all stock science experiments, I think. Change the '2' to your liking.


@PART[*]:HAS[@MODULE[ModuleScienceExperiment]]
{
    @MODULE[ModuleScienceExperiment]
    {
    @interactionRange *=2
    }
}
